part.Name: Description
part.Short: Anarchy is wound into stasis by time's virtual antipode and packaged into a metal disc. Only the instruction of movement will direct it to unaccrete.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small sphere.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wood was shaved into a bludgeoning bulb.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quartersawn witchwood wears a thousand nicks along it's warped length.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Brinestalk was scythed from its marsh home and dried in the high salt sun. Its top is spiraled into a crook.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A corm of bell bronze is screw-fitted to a scarred wooden shaft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Iron lines unfold into a head of six flanges.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hand grease shines on the pole, and a volume of polished steel weights one end.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hand grease shines on the tall pole, and a hefty volume of polished steel weighs one end.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A corm of polished steel is blown out of a combat-pecked rod.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Across Moghra'yi, wood was hewn from the trunk of a boreal titan and shaved into a stick by practitioners of the foreign art. They shaped one end of the bark into an oaken knot.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A fist-sized snail shell is coiled in soft spirals, blackened with soot, and stinks of sulfur.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's the hoary, bowing horn of a wizened mangoat, wind-etched and gilded with scarlet tassels.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a gnarled, acacia staff set with a small orb of primordial amber.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The shaft widens to a rigid polygon of azure metal. Nicks and scores tally on its surface.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The long shaft widens to a rigid and symmetric polygon of azure metal. Nicks and scores tally on its two heads.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The hammer shaft is capped by a head of bright and azure metal. Darker stripes across its face and throat note where it struck and beat softer carbide down.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The hammer pole is capped by a twin-head of bright and azure metal. Darker stripes across its faces and throats note where it struck and beat softer carbide down.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A dusky mass of gravid metal, like a meteorite, is welded to a steel shaft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A dusky and twin-faced mass of gravid metal, like a meteorite, is welded to a steel pole.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue. Casts mottled with dust particles were culled and fed to lithovores, leaving only the perfect hexagonal prisms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue. Casts mottled with dust particles were culled and fed to lithovores, leaving only the perfect hexagonal prisms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bands of aquamarine lodestone tori wrap around the hitting part of a hefty, double-fisted truncheon. On the bottom handle there's a slot for a battery to juice the magnets.

part.Name: LatchesOn
part.BehaviorDescription: Latches onto metal objects for 8-12 rounds.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This humongous skull of a rhinox is made of some of the hardest organic materials known to man. A massive shaft of steel has been driven through the maw and welded to the interior of the skull, producing an enormous maul.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A telescoping, slate-colored rod with a knob on the head.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A flanged rod of slate grey metal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ring magnets form a cylindric mace-head to bash against objects and syphon their electron juice into a battery slotted on the shaft.

part.Name: SapChargeOnHit
part.BehaviorDescription: On a successful hit, drains electrical charge from its target and its target's equipment and transfers the charge to the energy cell slotted into itself.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bell bronze is shaped to a point and its handle wrapped in leather.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Iron wormwags out of its halite stub of a hilt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Pits mark the blade like craters on an iron edge-world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bright metal spills out the leather fuzz hilt along the killer's recurve.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The edge is bright and polished.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A use-dull and finger-smudged knife folds in on itself.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wet clay dresses the edge and dirt cakes the hilt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wide and bright blade has been painted with entrails.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Salt and scars form a comet's tail along the azure blade edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Volcanic glass was fished from Fuming God Sea and chipped to shape along the Icepyres.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blue and shining metal narrows to a sticking point.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A ribbon of leather is looped through the hilt of a bright blade.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A razor edge of dense and dusky metal zigzags in shape. Its face is matte and starless.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A short shimmering blue blade extends from a dense black plastic hand-grip.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: When charged, this weapon's penetration value is equal to the defender's armor value.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This wood-gripped hilt emits a thin, terse, undulous beam of pale green light, whose intensity is such that it may cut away steel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This wood-gripped hilt emits a long and narrow beam of pale green light, whose intensity is such that it may cut away steel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This wood-gripped hilt emits a thin, terse, undulous beam of pale green light, whose intensity is such that it may cut away steel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Damp leather wraps the wood haft up to a sharpened bit of bell bronze.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An axe edge is dressed with splinter hairs of brinestalk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wrought iron was moulded to a crescent for scything the rough hides of watervine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hairline rust ribbons the bit from hook to hook on the year-weary axe.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its polished steel glistens on a flat plane, and skin oil stains the straps of its leathery haft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its polished steel glistens on a flat twin plane, and skin oil stains the straps of its long leathery haft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A block of bright steel was sharpened to an edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its polished steel glistens on a flat plane, and skin oil stains the straps of its leathery haft. The pommel is capped with a glittering opal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bright steel was moulded to a crescent for scything the rough hides of watervine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The luster of the azure edge fades to shadow at the beard of the bit, and a backspike balances the whole bladed volume.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The luster of the wide azure edge fades to shadow at the beard of the twin bits. Hairline cracks ribbon the haft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bright azure metal edges out into an elegant half-circle bound to a steel shaft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bright azure metal edges out into two elegant half-circles bound to a long steel shaft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A razored wedge of dusky metal was welded to a steel haft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wide razored wedge of dusky metal was welded to a great steel haft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A plastic handle with a retractable, weighted metal cord inside.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A leather lash and handle.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Scratches checker the length of edged bell bronze, and skin oil dampens the leather grip.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Scratches checker the broad length of edged bell bronze, and skin oil dampens the double-handed leather grip.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Pits mark the length of the blade like craters on an iron edge-world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Pits mark the broad length of the blade like craters on an iron edge-world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The long edge is bright and polished.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The long edge is bright and polished. A wide grip is stained with dozens of oily fingerprints.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Salt and scars form a comet's tail along the length of the azure blade's edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Salt and scars form a comet's tail along the broad length of the azure blade's edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bright metal is polished to a ghost shine. Streaks of shaded blue show where the blade was carbon-folded on the forge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bright and wide metal is polished to a ghost shine. Streaks of shaded blue show where the large blade was carbon-folded on the forge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A razored edge of matte and starless alloy lengthens from point to welded shaft of steel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wide and razored edge of matte and starless alloy lengthens from point to welded shaft of steel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Skeletal coral was torn off its reef-home and chewed to a cutting edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This blade is bowed and black as the desert night. The hilt is inscribed with gold, calligraphic glyphs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A long, humming white blade extends an arm's length from a dense black plastic hand-grip.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: When charged, this weapon's penetration value is equal to the defender's armor value.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: What was once merely a carbide axe is now a work of art. Curling wires wind around the haft of the weapon as the creeping vine of a rose, modules and battery housing mounted on the flat of its blade where otherwise the rose's blossoming head would rest.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This weapon of war seems a strange fit for an agrarian people such as the hindren, but if nothing else it serves to illustrate that even prey animals cannot be lightly considered. The air swims around the axe's triangular head like summer heat, but it can kill even faster than the high salt sun.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Somewhere between battle axe and vinereaper, the icy ancestral tool called Yal represents the eternal struggle between the industriousness of the hindren people and the cruelty of harsh winters. The biting cold of its curved blade is as sharp as its honed carbide edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This large meat cleaver is exquisitely crafted from wood and tempered steel, its side filigreed with intricate leaf designs and bearing the name 'Difucila'.
part.Mark: &R&C: This weapon bears the mark of Sparafucile.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A colossal, clenched fist gilded with the blood of a demigod.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: From a hilt broken and remade, reinforced and wrapped and upkept time and again, extends an ancient double-edged blade. Murdered and reborn over ages, the blade bears scars from battles older than the memory of the techniques that forced it into killing shape time and again.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Lead is shaped in a cylindric lump.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Pocks sprinkle the barrel steel from a hundred salt storms. The stock is spoon carved from fibrous brinestalk in the style of the Issachari dune tribe.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Carbon steel gleams on its sawed muzzle. A dented butt stock cuts at right angle to the shoulder.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Carbon steel gleams on its sawed muzzle. A dented butt stock cuts at right angle to the shoulder.
part.Mark: &R&C: This weapon bears the mark of Sparafucile.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Expert rifling grooved its carbon steel barrel to helical precision. Smudges are printed on the scope glass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A smoothbore barrel of found steel is blackened by pocks of gunpowder mess.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Telescoped cylinders pinch the mirror point, and under them grows a sylph-like stock of sea-ferried nutwood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Three carbon steel barrels fit together into an arc-edged triangle of luminous ritualism. They pinch the mirror point inside.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Perpendicular to the neon azure barrel is a square-plated scope inset with a large ocular lens. The sight through the lens distorts as the gun tilts, but the vector drawn remains unchanged.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Gaseous coolant billows through a chiffon tube, putting dew on the wide and planar barrel chrome. It spills out onto the air from a ice-chipped muzzle.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A rifled prism refracts and refocuses light to tunnel things toward its wielder. Sophists call it a 'here ray'.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Artisanally carved wood castles a sextet of parallel conductors and a sliding photon armature. The grain is scorched black on the rifle's stock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hue-vapored crysteel cocoons the gold/water mechanism that pinches light from wavelength to waveshort. Plasmon slag bubbles on the crest of the barrel like superheated sludge-life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Astralgals demarcate the phasic slits along the frustum's length. Noise is sucked out of time in expectancy of cross-plane fusion.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The hind bone of a salthopper was scorched clean and bent to a recurve bow. Sinew is strung on the nocks.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Idler wheels were tinkered to the limbs, and wound cables stiffen to accentuate the archer's strength.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small crossbow with a wide barrel to hold darts.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Magnets on the string nocks hum and a slender curve of metal hums back. The air crackles as fingers approach the arrow rest.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Servos click on the wheeling groves and a miniature air turbine exaggerates the pull of the bowstring.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: This weapon increases the base penetration of its ammo by 4. This weapon increases the damage die of its ammo by 4. This weapon increases the damage bonus of its ammo by 1.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A short wooden arrow, fletched with glowcrow feathers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A steel-headed arrow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Reds and oranges swirl in the bulbous arrowhead. Ignition is a notch away.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A carbide-headed arrow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An arrow with a folded carbide head.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A fullerite-headed arrow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A crysteel-headed arrow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An arrow with a flawless crysteel head.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A zetachrome-headed arrow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chrome chain wraps around a self-winding flywheel and is spotted with grease dew. One long barrel is nicked with steel scarring.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The tick of a firing pin against steel makes the fauna start. A chrome sight eases the arc of the parabola.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Grease wets the arming handle and streaks down the wide missile chute toward a welded shoulder rest.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bright gashead tips the end of the steely death chute.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A limpid fuel pump exposes ribbons of oil slick, and behind it a voltage gauge ticks. The slanted heat shield is scorched black.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hand pump slides into a chrome canister with illustrations of wilting plants etched in relief.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hand pump slides into a chrome canister with illustrations of rotting fungi etched in relief.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Caked gundust is painted on the inner lune of the mortar.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hermetic cask, hose, and nozzle. Inscribed are the words: 'in case of dimensional emergency, spray'.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cables purled together form the barrel of a blastgun that fires along the cambered electromagnetic field lines.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Baroque and kite-like volumes of metal are arranged on an axis as a lathe to shave dimensionality off their inner spaces. A giant stock and grip of painted fullerite support their tremendous weight.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A kinetic energy weapon with a massive barrel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Girded in chrome is a hundred-dimpled titan, an egg sac where rocket children ignite on their mother's back, explode into aether, and congeal again in the conflagrative consummation.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A smudged and salted chrome wheel clicks to moon time. Just above a brinestalk hand panel, the grip medallion shines in delphian lineage.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Black acrylic grips are run through with hairline cracks from where nervous and sweat-damp hands squeezed the precision out of their shot.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A tin-slender clip hangs off the scratched chrome magazine well.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The pistol is engraved with watervine hemp and encircled in saltstone. On the grip is an image of a nomad and knight in saltstone. The knight is striking down the nomad.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Perpendicular to the neon azure barrel is a square-plated scope inset with a large ocular lens. The sight through the lens distorts as the gun tilts, but the vector drawn remains unchanged.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A spiral crank closes a chrome-encased circuit and ejects charge through two contact tips. Smoke twirls through their yellow glow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Starless metal on the barrel imbibes light and routes it to the null place. The grip acrylic is patterned after ley lines.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Artisanally carved wood castles a sextet of parallel conductors and a sliding photon armature. The grain is scorched black on the pistol's stock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A coolant pipe and an antifreeze pipe are barrel-locked in symmetric geometry. Thumb flips rotate the mechanism and reverse their orientation.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blood sieved of chunky pieces sloshes around a cannister of tetraxenonoglass glass. Vacuum pressure sucks air in through the barrel, and slits on the slide stop vent a metronomic belch.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hue-vapored crysteel cocoons the gold/water mechanism that pinches light from wavelength to waveshort. Plasmon slag bubbles on the crest of the barrel like superheated sludge-life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Behind the muzzle, a glass-bound nimbus of unstable spacetime curls around an astral tether. The trigger mechanism cuts the tether and out-vacuums the anomaly to the free world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A spiral crank closes a chrome-encased circuit and ejects immense amounts of charge through two contact tips. Smoke twirls through their white-hot glow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Raw flesh is stretched on a lump that approximates the shape of a handgun. Pressure smushes a throbbing vein against the underskin and blood-pulp is coughed out of two ribbed metal tubes on a metronome tick. At moments out of sequence, an unseen energy is piped along the psychic leys and into the organ-mess, producing a runny bother.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A handful of pellets are encased in a thick wax-paper and plastic shell.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A nutwood forestock hangs underneath the chrome rib and, when pumped, erupts into ecstatic clicking.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Nutwood stock parts were unscrewed in favor of starless metal. A greased pump slides shot to the chamber with minimal friction.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The craftsmanship of this pistol worked in chrome and brass is breathtaking -- grips of kingswood wrap your palm around themselves, the hammer is contoured to your thumb with infinitesimal precision, the eye of the barrel leers at your target. Twines of withered ivy are engraved along its frame and down its barrel stained with age and blood.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: +1 Ego Critical hits scored with this weapon bestow a +4 bonus to its penetration rolls. Whenever you discharge a full barrel of ammo with this weapon, you automatically score a critical hit with the last shot you fire.

part.Name: TakenAccomplishment
part.Text: You recovered the masterwork pistol and legendary ode to vengeance, the =this=.
part.Hagiograph: The gunslinger-sultan =name= slew each of the seven lords of House Isner with a masterwork revolver and supped over their piled corpses.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ions spun into a euhedral disc on a spinning wheel crystallizer. Aquamarine smoothed into a wheel by deepsea steam vents.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small axe, balanced for throwing.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Flax was mowed from the Bowl of Iris, stripped into fibers, and weaved into a soft grid by the fisherfolk of the Pale Sea.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A stone.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small, but heavy, stone.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A large and heavy stone.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A piece of rock, older than every book.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A piece of rock, older than every book.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sizable piece of rock, older than every symbol.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A huge piece of rock, older than every idea.

part.Short: A silver cylinder with a pull ring.

part.Short: A silver cylinder with a pull ring.

part.Short: A pair of massive, feathered wings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chitinous, segmented tail tapering into a curved barb slick with venom.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of massive, curling horns. They can deliver devastating gore attacks to enemies.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Iron hooks can be fastened to residual leg limbs, providing a kind of graceless, scraping locomotion for their wearer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Some facial appendages are so sightly, scattering light like the prismatic loam or curving toward geometric bliss. But there are many others.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Huge spade-like claws as hard as any natural substance (and many unnatural).

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ghostly, flickering flames drift up.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ghostly mist drifts up.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The air in this area shimmers with intense heat, as if filled with an invisible fire.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A frigid, cloying mist hangs in the air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ageless dark, stained robes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dark, soot-stained robes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A huge pile of stinking, lice-infested animal hide.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This simple tunic is woven of stiff plant fiber. It's surprisingly comfortable.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This airy robe is woven from fine cloth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A kilt woven of thick plaid wool.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This toga is fashioned of crude, roughly woven textile.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This toga has been well-used, as togas are wont to be.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Boar hide was brined, limed, and put in a tanning drum. It was cut and fitted into an apron, and now it's a brown canvas for knife scars and tong burns.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This well-worn set of overalls are made from sturdy cloth, and covered in small pockets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit of armor is made of thick overlapping slabs of rock-hard bark, sewn to a coarse, itchy plant-fiber undergarment. It smells pretty good.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit of leather armor has been cured until it is rock hard.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Swaddled in green growth, its wearer becomes another country-cloaked and time-eaten statue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit of hard leather armor is covered in metal studs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A delver's vest covered in a dense tangle of webbing and a plethora of pockets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wool smock blotched with soot.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A frock of slate cloth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rough and itchy flax was coarsely threaded, cut to shape, and cinched by a hemp rope.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit of armor is made of dozens of thick rings of metal, which have been sewn into a padded leather undershirt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A protective shirt of tiny, interlocked metal links.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit of armor is made of many large plates of forged metal over a layer of chain-mail. The whole mass is stiched to an under-garment of leather and padding.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This vest is cut from the chitinous exoskeleton molted by Qud's jungle puma; thick, flexible rings the color of tree bark protect the torso of its wearer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bodysuit made of a stretchy black fabric that sticks to the torso.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A coat of several frayed, varicolored patches stitched together.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit of armor is made of overlapping slabs of thin-blue metal, welded to a chain-mail undergarment.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An ornately sewn mantle of slate cloth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A vest cut from an elastyne mesh and reinforced with plastic.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This skin-tight flesh suit is made of elastic rubber.

part.Name: Description

part.Short: This stretchy, foam fabric hardens when pressure is applied to it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit is made of extremely durable, rubbery, dark material. It is lined with small pouches which slowly filter water that the suit collects from your sweaty, overworked body.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A densely camouflaged leather jerkin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit of armor is forged from massive slabs of black, unbreakable material.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This suit of armor is made of hundreds of small chips of fullerite, bound to a hard leather cuirass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The manifold fibers are colorful and have a touching texture like no other fabric. A molecular weft was pulled through shrinking warps on a fractal loom.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tetraglass tubes of coolant and antifreeze snake their way over the keg-mail's compressors, and condenser and evaporator coils spin out the shoulders like grandfather trees above the insulation shrub.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dyed crysteel canisters are fitted to a backrack. Their valves pop out of flux pressurizers, and a splay of hoses allow for several input flows.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue. Casts mottled with dust particles were culled and fed to lithovores, leaving only the perfect hexagonal prisms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A dense mesh of dilated tetraglass tubes convey coolant and antifreeze over the keg-mail's jumbo compressors. Blower motors drone a low hum, and condenser and evaporator coils spin out the shoulders like grandfather trees above the insulation shrub.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A calcerous shell was whittled to a hoop dress. Its whorls impress the eye with pleasing geometry before swerving to uncomfortable and dizzying disharmony.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A comely, multicolored shawl sure to distinguish its wearer from the rest of the pack.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A long, hooded cloak white-washed from years of exposure to the desert sun.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A long, twisted braid of shock-white ape hair.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A shawl woven of fine, scarlet silk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A tough leather cloak.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cloak made of dark fabric, which hangs with supernatural heavyness even in a strong wind.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A salt-spangled crimson banner of the Issachari nomad people.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An elaborate, flap-powered contraption of corroded bronze and parasols.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A large, moss-colored pack equipped with shoulder straps and a hip belt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A swath of verdant forest loam.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Soft fur is cut from the alabaster pelt of an albino ape into a broad-shouldered cloak.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bees crawl over the back-mounted slatted rack. A few more dart around nearby.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sewn mantle of chromaic fabric ornately embroidered with a thousand stitches.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An old ropeworking ritual was used to weave a back-worn net of fibrous and supportive straps.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cloak of unrippable synthetic fabric.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The fine, decorated cloak of a Ibulian Praetorian.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Articulated blades unfold to form an aerial screw that gets blown upward by an air thruster mounted below. On activation, the equipper takes flight.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This pair of prosthetic hands are attached to the ends of two telescoping, multi-jointed chrome rods which fasten into a thin plastic case designed to be worn on the back.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Air circulates and the sheet-standard breathes; the edges of the red diamond shrink and lengthen. Blood courses through the arteries of time and into the tissue of the new flesh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Animated birds flap and shift over the cloak's folds and ruffles. A myriad of species, sizes and colors.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Prism-studded skin was shorn from a dead monkey and sawed into a cloak.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Slate tubes assembled to scaffold the human form.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Points of discontiguous matter flock in a crescent to a mock wind. Together they bend light across its full spectrum and blur the wearer's torso to a polychrome mess.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Coarse fur is cut from the thickset pelt of an ogre ape into a broad-shouldered cloak.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cerata pendulate on the cape like prism grass of a windy meadow. They mirror rich hues in cerulean, ruby, star orchid, and void; together they shine to resplendent effect.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Witchwood twigs pared and twisted into a decorative wreath.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This filthy, beaten hat was drawn low over countless wearers' eyes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In wool paper and acrylic the pain of experience is smoothed away into the uniform child's cone. Arterial clamps peek out from the interior surface. The cone is fastened by a brass chain, adorned by beads of glass, and branded on the apex with the Holy Rhombus, a sign of the price of innocence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A utilitarian leather skullcap.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A close-fitting hood, woven of crimson fabric.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hideous, plated skull with gaping beak.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A conical helm of polished steel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cap made of a stretchy black fabric that sticks to the scalp.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The hollowed-out, xanthous shell of the electric snail armors the head while only minorly impairing vision.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Soft fur is cut from the alabaster pelt of an albino ape into a tam with earflaps.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A square, black cap with a gold tassel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A heavy coif of densely interlinked chain-mail.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The moss-strewn antlers of some great elk appear to have grown from atop this ageless, leather helm.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A leather strap with an affixed lamp.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sturdy helmet, with built in illumination.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This stretchy, foam fabric hardens when pressure is applied to it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A helmet, camouflaged for the deep jungles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The teleprojector is a fluted visor of fused tungsten filament. Two antennae coil out of the temples.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A dark, visored helmet made of jet black fullerite.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Prism-studded skin was shorn from a dead monkey and sawed into a hat.

part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Short: Coarse fur is cut from the thickset pelt of an ogre ape into a tam with earflaps.

part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue. Casts mottled with dust particles were culled and fed to lithovores, leaving only the perfect hexagonal prisms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Airy thoughtstuff was deposited by the pressure of the material realm into a jellified substance and curled into a cirlet. It's bejeweled with crystalline microlife, symbiotes hatched in the thick of the psychic sea.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Failed psychic attacks against you cause the attacker to hemorrhage.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A calcerous shell was chopped off at the tip. Its whorls impress the eye with pleasing geometry before swerving to uncomfortable and dizzying disharmony.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A lightweight cap of shiny foil.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A veil cut from a thin, flame-retardant fabric woven by the Issachari nomad tribes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This is a very fancy smiling sun mask. It smells faintly of ancient, dried grapes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This is a highly decorative frowning moon mask. Gazing at it makes you feel somewhat sleepy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This is a spectacularly crafted sun and moon mask. It makes you feel uneasy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In wool paper and acrylic the pain of experience is smoothed away into the aspect of a child. Neuronal clamps peek out from the concave interior surface. The mask is fastened by a brass chain, adorned by beads of glass, and branded on the forehead with the Holy Rhombus, a sign of the price of innocence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chrome-brass rings and swarths of leather are precisely cut from a tinker's stencil, but the real signature is on the glass: a scatter of speck-sized fractures from the high salt gales.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Light flecks break themselves on the silver moat and rush back to their place of origin. The signifier becomes the signified; the simulacrum is realized.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of oddly shaped goggles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A piece of thick burlap, impregnated with vinewood sap, helping to protect against noxious gas and vapor.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A durable mask of plastic, fitted with a simple filter that provides good protection against dangerous gas and vapor.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Curved glass caps the narrowest in a series of concentric brass tubes. The widest one is fitted with a leather head-strap.

part.Name: Toolbox
part.BehaviorDescription: Grants a bonus to identifying artifacts as if your Intelligence score were increased by 5.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Vision-correcting lenses on thin wire frames.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Colorful rings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Silver was melted and cast to a perfect sphere in isomorphic veneration of the Kasaphescence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The glass lune is showered in information across the electromagnetic channels.

part.Name: Description
part.Short:
Visual Instrument and Sensory Augmentation (G Edition)
Data is painted back and forth between the glass lunes of visor and wristlet. Whereas the outer trim shines gold on F Edition, on this model it fades to grey.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ring-molds on the laminated metal frame collect ambient sensory data and use it to augment the viewing frustum.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Grants night vision. You can see through the first two occluding objects in your line of sight.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: These beads were skillfully dyed and strung together by a hillside native.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A copper ring bespattered with worm blood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A brass compass fastened to a leather wristband.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Miniature airfoil blades spin on the circular face and blow gentle air.

part.Name: TemperatureAdjuster
part.BehaviorDescription: Provides a small amount of cooling.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slender cut of brass painted and intricately worked into the shape of a poisonous serpent.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This simple arm brace is crafted from boiled boar leather and tied on with braided lace. The strips of protective hide are designed to redirect glancing blows to the arm and protect poor archers from their own errant bowstrings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wrist-mounted display device that gives a detailed readout of the life signs of biological entities in its surroundings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wrist-mounted display device that gives a detailed readout on the structural integrity of simple inanimate objects in its surroundings.

object.Name: Child of the Deep Structural Scanning Bracelet

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A plastic band with a recessed button on a chrome faceplate. "You think this is the real =name=? It is."

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wrist-mounted force-field emitter.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Diodes burn their cyan light through an atmosphere of glass curved around a metal link.

part.Name: Toolbox
part.BehaviorDescription: When equipped and powered, this item grants a bonus to identifying artifacts as if your Intelligence score were increased by 2.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Gridlines and a red dot are painted on the glass lune, and simple rectangles depict the once-ordered streets of chromium that've since burst like gnarled roots through space and time.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A knitted sleeve that warms as you wear it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Slick grease-stuff coats the hexagonally-arranged pores across the surface of the metal torus. There's a push cap for lubricant refills.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hieroglyphs of fluctation are incised on the inner surface of this shiny metal torus.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plutonic metal is etched with a two-dimensional projection of the rhombic dodecahedral honeycomb, allowing it to snap onto the ley lines of the local region.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bars partition the bangle clasp into three bands; a cobalt button summons the rest of the quartet.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hard leather gloves worn by the moisture farmers of Joppa to protect their hands from the briary watervine fronds.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sturdy set of leather gloves.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Thick, banded steel gauntlets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: These skin-tight gloves occasionally jolt the hands into performing with added strength and dexterity.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Soft fur is cut from the alabaster pelt of an albino ape into thick-fingered gloves.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Gloves made of a stretchy black fabric that sticks to your hands.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of gloves, made of chain-mail.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Thick, banded carbide gauntlets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This stretchy, foam fabric hardens when pressure is applied to it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Articulated gauntlets, made of many linked rings of fullerite.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Prism-studded skin was shorn from a dead monkey and sawed into a pair of gloves.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Coarse fur is cut from the thickset pelt of an ogre ape into wide-fingered gloves, and giant knuckles sawed to points stick through.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue. Casts mottled with dust particles were culled and fed to lithovores, leaving only the perfect hexagonal prisms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cerata pendulate on the muffs like crystal-mold on a tree ring. They mirror rich hues in cerulean, ruby, star orchid, and void; together they shine to resplendent effect.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fullerene finger extensors splay like fashionable court nails. Their girths are shrunk or unshrunk to task requirements by minuscule servos embedded in the webbing.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Your weapons' percentage-based effects are 3X as likely to occur, including the base chance for critical hits.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A soft-soled shoe worked from boar hide.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of cracked leather sandals.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Scutes are arranged like stony pikes around the apron of the shoe. Light is tossed off the enamel shine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A well-worn pair of leather boots.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of metal boots, with thick magnetic soles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pearl fastens these well-crafted sandals. The natives believe they belonged to the nymphs who inhabit the river beneath Red Rock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of boots, made of chain-mail sewn over thick leather backing.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of leather boots onto which several steel bands have been riveted.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Slippers made of a stretchy black fabric that sticks to your feet.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of leather boots onto which several carbide bands have been riveted.

part.Name: Description
part.Short:
Some clever tinker has fitted a spring-loaded tendon around each of these boots to mimic the gait of a large, sprinting bird.
&CAs long as you have worn this item for at least 100 rounds, you sprint at thrice your movement speed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of leather boots onto which several steel bands have been riveted. Grease has been applied to their soles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This stretchy, foam fabric hardens when pressure is applied to it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pearl fastens these well-crafted sandals. The natives believe they belonged to the nymphs who inhabit the river beneath Red Rock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Heavy, plated boots made of welded slabs of fullerite.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The ankle is cinched by a leather strap and goldleaf buckle; crushed plant matter soils the soles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The finned and wheeled boot had become the sigil of several sects of socionauts by the Late Sultanate. For decades their progenitors careened through the capsule pipelines of the slouching arcology, dismantling it plate by plate, pursued by the constabulary but ferried by their skates to the safety of their moss-skirted hideouts. The metaphor was writ large on the glass guts of the city: Scorch the past. Rocket into the future.

part.Name: TemperatureAdjuster
part.BehaviorDescription: Heats up the area around the wearer when in operation.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Calligraphs are incised in uneven rows and columns that meander across the quarter and back stay of the boot. Their character mass appears to orbit a central statement: "The path is contracted." The rest of the script is etched in a variety of signs and styles that offer competing and composite interpretations of the cryptic proclamation.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue. Casts mottled with dust particles were culled and fed to lithovores, leaving only the perfect hexagonal prisms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A kaleidoscopic tartan textures the tongue and vamp. On the backstay, a diode square displays the image of a morphing wall.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ur-metal strips on the soles are magnetized by bosonic coils, producing a continuous ribbon of negative-mass bubbles that repel the wearer upward.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cerata pendulate on the shoe tips like the Beetle Moon curled through fog. They mirror rich hues in cerulean, ruby, star orchid, and void; together they shine to resplendent effect.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A simple sole and straps of leather inlaid with a shining emerald.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A convex, translucent lens the size of a man's torso and suspended in thin air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mote of gentle light darts about.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Emits light in radius 4. Extinguished permanently when unequipped.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A luminous mote of glowmoth dust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This opaline, phosphorescent globe glows with the light of auroras absorbed eons ago. It floats about preternaturally.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This opaline, phosphorescent globe glows with the light of auroras absorbed eons ago. It floats about preternaturally.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a robotic eye lidded by a furcate chassis and embellished with antenna lashes. A minuscule barrel pokes out from its pupil and vibrates. The inner lid is articulated, allowing the drone to scan for incoming projectiles and shoot them down with laser light.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Giant, flattened rings of hypercooled crysteel correlate their wearer to an astronomical body and serve as celestial equator, declination, and meridian. Their edges are filed on a nanon lathe and slice through orbiting debris.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small wooden shield meant to be strapped to the arm, leaving the hands free.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small iron shield meant to be strapped to the arm, leaving the hands free.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small steel shield meant to be strapped to the arm, leaving the hands free.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A large shield, meant to be secured to your hand.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A large shield, meant to be secured to your hand.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A black aegis bearing the cross of the Putus Templar.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A decorative clay pot.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Metal frames are mounted on treads to protect against wheel-cramming detritus.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rust stripes this ageless, flat-faced buckler. Painted on its face is the coat of arms of an archaic house -- white runic script on a field of crimson.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: +1 Ego You may activate this item to conjure a force field in front of you. Robots will often be unable to advance toward you while the force field is active.

part.Name: TakenAccomplishment
part.Text: You recovered the lost aegis of House Yish, =this=.
part.Hagiograph: Recall how =name= wrested the legendary aegis =this= from the paws of a lowly snapjaw and averred descendency from the Saads of Yish!

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The boartooth beads on this ancient charm have been worn down by the years, but the flexible cable that holds them together is as strong as the day it was made. Dangling from the bracelet is a figurine of a deer crafted in exquisite detail from a mysterious substance that's smooth as glass but hard as steel.

part.Name: TakenAccomplishment
part.Text: You recovered the ancestral bracelet of the hindren, =this=.
part.Hagiograph: Through the exhibition of =their= extraordinary guile, =name= was able to recover =this=, the ancestral bracelet of the hindren, and was conferred thusly the title of Grand-Doe.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A different glyph for 'life' is etched into each shining chrome segment of the wristband.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pustulent girdle that slowly undulates with latent vitality.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: While equipped you take half damage from poison.

part.Name: Description
part.Short:
Two shining chrome and platinum rocket-shaped cylinders straddle a metal grill. Atop each is a conical copper cap, and from the bottom of each streams a brilliant, fiery flume.
&CYou may activate this item to enter a &Wdashing&C state. &CWhile dashing, whenever you move in a direction, you dash toward the nearest enemy or obstacle and perform an attack. &CFor every three spaces you dash, you gain a +2 bonus to hit and a +2 penetration bonus to attacks you make. &CIf you do not encounter an enemy or obstacle after twenty squares, you stop dashing.
&CDuration: 10 rounds &CCooldown: 100 rounds

part.Name: TakenAccomplishment
part.Text: The Sky-Bear flies anew! From the clutches of the frozen past, you recovered =this=.
part.Hagiograph: The hot, wet breath of the underearth defossilized the Sky-Bear and apprised us of this truth: =name= is Saad Amus, Saad Amus is =name=.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Once-familiar paper, paint, and beads are rearranged to a beastly shape. Pale cyan lights gleam in its hollow eye sockets, a wicked beak opens in frozen menace, and brass chains hold together the pieces of torn innocence that craft the Murmur.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This black slab of metal has been burnished clean of any symbol that may once have emblazoned its matte surface.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: From deep as stratum 29, this cape was knit from trash; a thousand years of history now draped across the ass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cross-section of trash reef has been whittled to the shape of a star. Chiliads of life-things, rocks, and ersatz matter ribbon its arms: a mosaic of polyps, a bouquet of kelp, burned glass, minted chrome, nebula shell, iris milk, and stray photonic fuzz peeled from a decaying hologram.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: This item doesn't need to be equipped for its effects to be active.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A starless, triangular prism of black glass.

part.Name: TakenAccomplishment
part.Text: You clutched the black glass of the =this= in your hands.
part.Hagiograph: Amaranthine =name=! Cower before the god-sultan who is wrought of =their= own dreamstuff, who bears the black glass!

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A thick, pulsing curtain of thrumming cables drapes over the shoulders, humming half-remembered insights to its wearer concerning the whimsies of long-forgotten artificers.

part.Name: Toolbox
part.BehaviorDescription: When powered, this item grants a 40% chance that a tinkered item will have a random item modification. This may include item modifications that aren't normally tinkerable.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The transparent cross over the center of this large convex circle is as sturdy as the rest, hard as crysteel but lighter than carbide. Even the humblest motes of airborne dust divert their path to avoid its pristine surface.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This crown of thorns points outward, but its wearer's mind is pierced all the same, drawing in will and broadcasting power. Receiving that broadcast, allies fold themselves thin and stitch new folds in the fabric of existence.

part.Name: FollowersGetTeleport
part.BehaviorDescription: Followers gain Teleportation 1.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Undulating about the bend in a limb, this bundled circle of glistening cable would make any wearer feel bound to motion. The legs long to run, and run they shall until they tire.

part.Name: IntPropertyChanger
part.BehaviorDescription: Wearer may take any action while sprinting at no additional penalty.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Shining jewels are scattered across the contours of a galactic visage, and edges drawn between them sketch the outline of a sashed Fool. Far away at the chrome crest, beads of bright and searing light suggest the shape of a medial ewer, and beyond its spout, a vast and timeful structure. The inside of the mask is ribboned with burnt tracery from where it was molded on a gallium lathe, then dyed with the milked irises of shedim and set to dry in a pool of warm static.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: +1 to all mutation levels +6 to cybernetics license tier

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Burning rubies, carnelians, and garnets are arranged as a warm and giving sun. Diminutive rocky orbs pass by in the near space of the visage, and in the far space a prism of freight lengthens into a wider void. The inside of the mask is ribboned with burnt tracery from where it was molded on a gallium lathe, then dyed with the milked irises of shedim and set to dry in a pool of warm static.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: On the countenance, ribbons of alabaster cloud circumscribe a lapis sea and forests of jade. At the median of it all, a Spindle pierces the outer rondure and disappears beyond the composition. The inside of the mask is ribboned with burnt tracery from where it was molded on a gallium lathe, then dyed with the milked irises of shedim and set to dry in a pool of warm static.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Jasper rocks break on the edges of the mask and hem in a pale sea of milky quartz. The Spindle bisects the wide Face, and symmetry blooms beneath it. The inside of the mask is ribboned with burnt tracery from where it was molded on a gallium lathe, then dyed with the milked irises of shedim and set to dry in a pool of warm static.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A single mount of inlaid basalt and malachite splays open; an image of the Spindle blossoms from its center and dominates the festooned aspect. The inside of the mask is ribboned with burnt tracery from where it was molded on a gallium lathe, then dyed with the milked irises of shedim and set to dry in a pool of warm static.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bowed lune is cracked from where it was smashed off the gallium lathe. The shedim had no eyes left to color the dim and final Face, and it lay too long discarded in a pool of warm static. The sultanate is broken.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Though it is approximately the size and heft of a human infant, this shiny black device's shape is more akin to a fetus torn early from the womb. Its surface is slick and warm, with a pale pulse breathing somewhere underneath its pitch-black skin. At the end of its tail is an orifice studded with hooked teeth, eternally questing for an anchor point that it never finds.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: All-color nacre is hardened into an ontologically perfect shape; the mathematics of spheres are mere approximations. Inside, ribboned patterns of aether are frozen in stasis and cohere as a moonlit vista, a scene somehow tethered to the spacetime point whence you observed it. The meaning of this pairing is unknown and unknowable.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: +40 psychic glimmer Objects you find are five times more likely to come from other dimensions.

part.Name: TakenAccomplishment
part.Text: You clutched =this= and dressed yourself in the mirror of realities.
part.Hagiograph: O! Our hearts turned to stellar remnants when =name= recited an elegy for the unknown girlchild Eudoxia!

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A tube of tetraxenonoglass glass glitters inside with opaline syrup.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: You gain either a permanent +2 bonus to a random attribute or two mutation points.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Light catches on four opaline corner pieces and a raised medallion set in the center of tessellated uuflax. Wonders are woven across the cyclopean tome.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial bell iron is shaped to an axe edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial slag steel is shaped to an axe edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial slag steel is shaped to a broad axe edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial bell iron is shaped to a short point.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial slag steel is shaped to an short point.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial bell iron is shaped to a blade's edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial bell iron is shaped to a wide blade's edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial slag steel is shaped to a blade's edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial slag steel is shaped to a wide blade's edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial bell iron is shaped to a hexagonal prism.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial bell iron is shaped to a wide hexagonal prism.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial slag steel is shaped to a hexagonal prism.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial slag steel is shaped to a wide hexagonal prism.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial slag steel is shaped to a smoothbore barrel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial slag steel is shaped to a spiraled barrel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial slag steel is shaped to a sawed off barrel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial slag steel is shaped to a barrel and grooved with helical precision.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A ceremonial chrome wheel clicks to moon time, and the grip medallion shines in delphian lineage.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Black acrylic grips are paired off the sides of ceremonial chrome magazine well.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A tin-slender clip hangs off the ceremonial chrome magazine well.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tiny glyphs are inscribed on each exterior face of the handheld box.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Perch fish nursed in the aquarium silos of a vacated sector were netted and skinned into strips. Those strips were tanned with chrome and stitched into this vest.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This frock is knit from imperishable uuflax stolen from an archway garden during a union dispute between the weavers' guild and the high-strata window makers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wrested from the liminal tiers of a shale-toppled spire, this animal skull was handed over to an etcher for decoration.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An imperishable uuflax sheet was torn from the elephantine spools in the market and sewn into a headdress.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Masks maintained their sacred status in the lives of the Eaters, even as they lost the capacity to stitch them into their own faces. This one is no different.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An imperishable uuflax sheet was torn from the elephantine spools in the market and stitched into a talma.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Perch fish leather was worn by fishworkers in the earlier sultanate, but by the time of *sultan* it was prized by gentlefolk. This pair is exquisitely crafted.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: While the steeple fires raged below, brave arconauts sank into the glowing depths to retrieve valuables. When their corpses were found, the sand in their pockets had been blown into glass beads. Sometime after, those beads were strung into a bracelet.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Perch fish leather boots, finest make. They were either stolen from the crypt of an older Eater or fashioned by a cordwainer to look like it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chipped-off chunk of Spindle, magnetized by the fall to earth, orbits its chosen warden.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Far from the soaring aegides of earlier periods, this concave ward was merely bent and polished on a municipal lathe.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chrome flakes fell like dander from broken belfries into the trash sea. They were scooped up by orefishers and traded up the silk chain. This shirt is fashioned from the flakes twisted into rings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Early period Eaters modded their genes to grow ur-filament hair. Later, once that technology was lost, graverobbers sheared it from their cadaverous scalps. In the time of *sultan*, it was called finery. This vest was knit from the stuff.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Early Eaters had enlarged their skulls for cosmetic reasons. By the time of *sultan*, the high minaret dwellers took to wearing them as helms. This one is exquisitely decorated.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Early period Eaters modded their genes to grow ur-filament hair. Later, once that technology was lost, graverobbers sheared it from their cadaverous scalps. In the time of *sultan*, it was called finery. This hat was knit from the stuff.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Masks maintained their sacred status in the lives of the Eaters, even as they lost the capacity to stitch them into their own faces. This one is no different.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This cloak was knit from strands ur-filament hair robbed from the graves of early Eaters.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Perch fish leather was worn by fishworkers in the earlier sultanate, but by the time of *sultan* it was prized by gentlefolk. This pair is exquisitely crafted.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: While the steeple fires raged below, brave arconauts sank into the glowing depths to retrieve valuables. When their corpses were found, the sand in their pockets had been blown into glass beads. Sometime after, those beads were strung into a bracelet.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Perch fish leather boots, finest make. They were either stolen from the crypt of an older Eater or fashioned by a cordwainer to look like it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chipped-off chunk of Spindle, magnetized by the fall to earth, orbits its chosen warden.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Far from the soaring aegides of earlier periods, this concave ward was merely bent and polished on a municipal lathe.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: When they were active, the crysteel blast furnaces belched slag into a belt of hills that cinctured the old arcology. In the age of *sultan*, the slag was mined and moulded into a glass replica of a crysteel hauberk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rubber insulation that diamond-tiled the high pneumatic ducts was cut free at midnight and ferried to a coven of tailors, who then stitched a bodice.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: When they were active, the crysteel blast furnaces belched slag into a belt of hills that cinctured the old arcology. In the age of *sultan*, the slag was mined and moulded into a glass replica of an crysteel miter.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rubber insulation that diamond-tiled the high pneumatic ducts was cut free at midnight and ferried to a coven of tailors, who then stitched a tam.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Masks maintained their sacred status in the lives of the Eaters, even as they lost the capacity to stitch them into their own faces. This one is no different.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An imperishable uuflax sheet was torn from the elephantine spools in the market and stitched into a geometrically patterned talma.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: When they were active, the crysteel blast furnaces belched slag into a belt of hills that cinctured the old arcology. In the age of *sultan*, the slag was mined and moulded into a glass replica of a pair of crysteel gauntlets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rubber insulation that diamond-tiled the high pneumatic ducts was cut free at midnight and ferried to a coven of tailors, who then stitched a pair of mittens.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A glossy foil clasp was pried off the glass guts of the polis and etched as jewelry.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: When they were active, the crysteel blast furnaces belched slag into a belt of hills that cinctured the old arcology. In the age of *sultan*, the slag was mined and moulded into a glass replica pair of crysteel sollerets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rubber insulation that diamond-tiled the high pneumatic ducts was cut free at midnight and ferried to a coven of tailors, who then stitched a pair of pantofles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chipped-off chunk of luminous Spindle, magnetized by the fall to earth, orbits its chosen warden.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: When they were active, the crysteel blast furnaces belched slag into a belt of hills that cinctured the old arcology. In the age of *sultan*, the slag was mined and moulded into a steel replica of the soaring aegides.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: When they were active, the crysteel blast furnaces belched slag into a belt of hills that cinctured the old arcology. In the age of *sultan*, the slag was mined and moulded into a glass replica of a crysteel hauberk, then reinforced with stonegut.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dead sponge was heaped into hexagonal prisms at Maqqom and ferried through canals to vault-shadowed kurna. There it was washed clean and spongeworked into a blouse.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: When they were active, the crysteel blast furnaces belched slag into a belt of hills that cinctured the old arcology. In the age of *sultan*, the slag was mined and moulded into a glass replica of an crysteel miter, then reinforced with stonegut.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dead sponge was heaped into hexagonal prisms at Maqqom and ferried through canals to vault-shadowed kurna. There it was washed clean and spongeworked into a bonnet.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Masks maintained their sacred status in the lives of the Eaters, even as they lost the capacity to stitch them into their own faces. This one is no different.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An imperishable uuflax sheet was torn from the elephantine spools in the market, twice-folded, and stitched into a geometrically patterned talma.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dead sponge was heaped into hexagonal prisms at Maqqom and ferried through canals to vault-shadowed kurna. There it was washed clean and spongeworked into a pair of gloves.

part.Short: A glossy foil clasp was pried off the glass guts of the polis and etched as jewelry.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dead sponge was heaped into hexagonal prisms at Maqqom and ferried through canals to vault-shadowed kurna. There it was washed clean and spongeworked into a pair of slipshoes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chipped-off chunk of luminous Spindle, magnetized by the fall to earth, orbits its chosen warden.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: When they were active, the crysteel blast furnaces belched slag into a belt of hills that cinctured the old arcology. In the age of *sultan*, the slag was mined and moulded into a steel replica of the soaring aegides, then reinforced with stonegut.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In vast abyssal halls spire-tall machine presses crushed black spheres into diamond killer. Once the lights burned out, magpie troupes cut hunks free with gaslight tools and brought them to the low-strata smitheries. This piece was forged into a cuirass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In vast abyssal halls spire-tall machine presses crushed black spheres into diamond killer. Once the lights burned out, magpie troupes cut hunks free with gaslight tools and brought them to the low-strata smitheries. This piece was cut and fitted to a plastic hauberk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In vast abyssal halls spire-tall machine presses crushed black spheres into diamond killer. Once the lights burned out, magpie troupes cut hunks free with gaslight tools and brought them to the low-strata smitheries. This piece was forged into an armet.

part.Short: A bright chrome clasp was pried off the glass guts of the polis and etched as jewelry.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In vast abyssal halls spire-tall machine presses crushed black spheres into diamond killer. Once the lights burned out, magpie troupes cut hunks free with gaslight tools and brought them to the low-strata smitheries. This piece was forged into a pair of sabatons.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chipped-off chunk of luminous Spindle, magnetized by the fall to earth, orbits its chosen warden.

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The manifold fibers are colorful and have a touching texture like no other fabric. A molecular weft was pulled through shrinking warps on a fractal loom.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Mellified skin is sutured to colorful uuflax in a psychotomimetic likeness to the Eater idols in the age of *sultan*.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An imperishable uuflax sheet was torn from the elephantine spools in the market, thrice-folded, and stitched into a geometrically patterned talma.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bright chrome clasp was pried off the glass guts of the polis and etched as jewelry.

part.Short: A chipped-off chunk of luminous Spindle, magnetized by the fall to earth, orbits its chosen warden.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An imperishable uuflax sheet was torn from the elephantine spools in the market, thrice-folded, and stitched into a geometrically patterned talma.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Offworld goldleaf spirals on the starpath.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chipped-off chunk of luminous Spindle, magnetized by the fall to earth, orbits its chosen warden.
